attributes.action: Bring back hanging for offences of child killers, terrorists and paedophiles
attributes.background:
Child killers,  paedophiles and terrorists take the lives of there victim's either by killing or in the case of paedophiles the child having to live with the memories. 
A life for a life instead of paying hundreds of thousands of pounds keeping these people in luxury in prison.

rejection.details:
The terms "pedophiles" and "terrorists" are used to describe people who have been convicted of a variety of different criminal offences. We're not sure which crimes you would like to be punishable by the death penalty.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
